hero.subtitle: multiple tasks — one ecosystem
hero.description: Create your own ecosystem for record automation

about.title: free your time from routine and your business from mistakes
about.description: maetry allows entrepreneurs to grow their business from anywhere in the world via a mobile app

julia.name: Julia
julia.text: Maetry helps me plan every day in the salon. I understand how many clients are registered and for which services, who is new and who is regular. The client base is formed without my participation

nikita.name: Nikita
nikita.text: I know a lot of beauty salons that don't use online enrollment. We need to look at what mistakes our competitors are making and do better. Our main flow of clients comes through maetry

sofia.name: Sofia
sofia.text: The app is constantly being improved together with our network of salons. At maetry, we follow analytics and monitor feedback. This helps us to work on the quality of service and improve the level of service

irina.name: Irina
irina.text: I started spending less time analyzing the salon's financial performance. This option allows me to determine which services are generating more profit and which ones need to be adjusted or improved

features.subtitle: maetry features
features.title: we adapt to any size business

management.title: management schedule
management.description: Add new employees and make flexible work schedules without overlap

notifications.title: notices of record
notifications.description: Automated appointment reminders to customers will help retain contact and increase profitability

onlineBooking.title: online appointment for clients
onlineBooking.description: recording without a call will allow you to process more requests and not waste time on confirming visits

q1.question: What features does the app provide?
q1.answer: To optimize the work of beauty salons maetry offers the following features: online appointment, automatic sending of notifications, formation of client base, analysis of financial indicators and integration with other services

q2.question: Will I be able to work in someone else's salon and own my own at the same time?

q3.question: Will I be able to bring an employee into my salon?
q3.answer: Yes, you can. To do this, you will need to go to the salon and create an invitation, then send the link to a staff member

q4.question: Will I be able to create an entry for a client that doesn't have the application?
q4.answer: Yes, you can. To do this, dont select a client right away. After you create the record, you will have a link that you can send to them

q5.question: Will I be able to add a link to a social media post via maetry?

prefooter.title: free trial
prefooter.subtitle: start growing your business today
prefooter.description: fast implementation - we will help you transfer the necessary data and customize the service for your tasks

appointments.title: Client Appointments
problems: Appointments are kept in notebooks and calendars, get lost
Difficult to distribute appointments between masters
solutions: All appointments centralized in the app
Display all masters on one screen

schedule.title: Work Schedule
problems: Hard to set up master shifts
Schedule changes take a lot of time

services.title: Service Catalog
problems: Services kept in memory or notebook
Unclear who provides service and at what price
solutions: Add services from ready list or manually
Individual prices and descriptions for masters

clients.title: Client Database
solutions: Add clients manually or through invitations

salon.title: Salon Settings
problems: Clients don't know contacts and address
solutions: Salon card with description and contacts

attraction.title: Client Attraction
problems: Hard to tell about yourself and attract new clients
solutions: Booking link in social media and website

workspaces.title: Work Spaces
problems: Masters work in different places and lose appointments
Salon owners spend time on different systems
solutions: Switch between salons in one touch
